title: The Unchecked Influence of NRA Lobbyist Marion Hammer
alt: Map visualizing the NRA grades of Florida lawmakers.
info: For a feature on NRA lobbyist Marion Hammer, I collaborated with The New Yorker's digital team to create an interactive map illustrating the NRA grades of every Florida lawmaker. I sourced the data from the NRA's archive, and built the map with D3. The graphic was published on The Trace and in The New Yorker's version of the article.
